$schema.description: The schema to verify this document against.

game.description: The name of your game, compatible with capital letters.

filler_item_name.description: Name of the filler items that get placed when there's no more real items to place.

starting_index.description: (Optional) (Advanced) Choose the starting index for your locations and items.

auto_send.description: (Optional) Will your client automatically send in-logic checks? WARNING: This should only be used for non-game manual worlds.

comment.description: (Optional) Does nothing, Its mainly here for Dev notes for future devs to understand your logic

items.description: (Optional) List of item to pick from. If not included will pick from 'item_categories' if present or from the entire item pool if absent

item_categories.description: (Optional) List of category of items to pick from. If not included will pick from 'items' if present or from the entire item pool if absent

random.description: (Optional) how many items of this block will be randomly added to inventory. Will add every item in the block if not included

if_previous_item.description: (Optional) Causes the starting item block to only occur when any of the matching items have already been added to starting inventory by any previous starting item blocks

yaml_option.description: (Optional) Array of Options that will decide if this block is rolled
